artist: Painter: After Abram Teniers; Engraver: Gérard Edelinck
description: portrait of Abram Teniers in an oval, on a pedestal; bust, turned left and looking out at viewer; wearing a fur hat
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image in black: ABRAM / TENIERS / Se ipse pinxit   Edelinick Eques scul. CPR / peintre de son Altesse Illustrissime / l\'Archduc Leopol, Gouvenr. des Pais Bas | in pencil on sheet: 2-461
title: Abram Teniers
